channel.title: How do i get a client to stop ddos?
channel.description:
I have been DDoS'd too many times today. Is there a way I can still use Allstar scape but, make the players use a client without giving out the ip? This way I can stop DDoS attacks..
Summary: I want to download a client that has the IP embedded and then still use my Allstar scape.
Thanks.

item.title: How do i get a client to stop ddos?
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

he also needs to close the source after because if not you can just open client.java and search for setserver and they will find the ip.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get a client to stop ddos?
